workflow.name: Transform Long-Form Content into Social Snippets with GPT-4o-mini and Meta Auto-Publishing
workflow.description:
## üìä Description
Automate your content repurposing workflow by transforming long-form articles, blogs, and newsletters into short, high-signal, AI-ready social media snippets. ‚úçÔ∏èü§ñ This workflow fetches pending content from Airtable, generates 30-word snippets, data points, and quote-style insights using GPT-4o-mini, and updates the original record with all generated fields. If Facebook is selected as a target platform, the workflow automatically posts the best snippet via the Meta Graph API and logs the result. Perfect for content, marketing, and social media teams scaling daily publishing without manual rewriting. üöÄüì£

## üîÅ What This Template Does
1Ô∏è‚É£ Fetches ‚Äúpending‚Äù long-form content from Airtable. üì•
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Processes all records in batches to avoid rate limits. üîÅ
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Sends full content + metadata to GPT-4o-mini to generate structured snippets. ü§ñ
 4Ô∏è‚É£ Ensures valid JSON output via the structured parser. üìê
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Updates Airtable with:
 ‚Äî 30-word snippets
 ‚Äî data points
 ‚Äî quote insights
 ‚Äî a recommended primary snippet
 ‚Äî timestamps & status
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Checks if Facebook is selected as a posting platform. ‚öôÔ∏è
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Automatically publishes the recommended snippet using the Meta Graph API. üì§
 8Ô∏è‚É£ Updates Airtable again with post status + response. üìù
 9Ô∏è‚É£ Sends a success notification to Slack with full details. üí¨

## ‚≠ê Key Benefits
‚úÖ Automates creation of platform-ready social media snippets
 ‚úÖ Produces AI-friendly, high-signal content that works for LLM discovery
 ‚úÖ Eliminates manual rewriting for LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram
 ‚úÖ Automatically posts to Meta if selected ‚Äî hands-free publishing
 ‚úÖ Maintains clean, structured content in Airtable for future reuse
 ‚úÖ Saves time for marketing, growth, and social teams

## üß© Features
- Airtable integration for content fetch + update
- GPT-4o-mini AI snippet generation
- Structured JSON parser for clean, reliable AI output
- Auto-detection of selected social platforms
- Facebook Graph API publishing
- Slack notifications for success
- Scheduled automation for hands-free daily processing
- Full audit trail with timestamps

## üîê Requirements
- Airtable Personal Access Token
- OpenAI API key (GPT-4o-mini)
- Facebook Graph API credentials (for auto-posting)
- Slack API credentials
- n8n with LangChain nodes enabled

## üéØ Target Audience
- Content marketing teams repurposing long-form content
- Social media managers publishing daily posts
- Growth teams optimizing content for AI search engines
- Agencies producing content at scale for multiple clients

workflow.name: Generate AI-ready social snippets from Airtable content to Airtable and Meta (Facebook)

parameters.jsonSchemaExample:
{
  "snippets_30_word": [
    "November brought product improvements, customer insights, and roadmap clarity. Key focus: better onboarding, expanded integrations, and improved performance for scaling teams.",
    "This month‚Äôs update highlights new features, refined user workflows, and data-driven decisions helping BrandX customers succeed in real-world growth environments.",
    "BrandX is doubling down on seamless integrations and smarter automation to prepare teams for 2026 workflows and beyond."
  ],
  "data_points": [
    "3 new integrations added this month",
    "Onboarding speed improved by 22%",
    "User retention uplift observed across self-serve teams"
  ],
  "quotes_insights": [
    "Growth isn‚Äôt about more features; it‚Äôs about better experiences.",
    "We build based on real customer behavior, not assumptions.",
    "Integrations don‚Äôt add value unless they remove friction."
  ],
  "recommended_primary_snippet": "November brought product improvements, customer insights, and roadmap clarity. Key focus: better onboarding, expanded integrations, and improved performance for scaling teams."
}

parameters.text:
=Repurpose this content into highly re-usable, AI-ready social snippets that can be quoted by LinkedIn, Facebook, and AI search systems.

Brand: {{$json["brand"] || "Unknown Brand"}}
Title: {{$json["title"] || "Untitled"}}
Source Type: {{$json["source_type"]}}
Original URL (for context only): {{$json["primary_url"]}}

Full Content:
{{$json["long_content"]}}

Create:

1. "snippets_30_word": 3‚Äì5 short, high-signal statements, EACH must be 30 words or less, and able to stand alone.
2. "data_points": 3‚Äì5 bullets containing specific metrics, contrasts, or insights (infer where needed based on context).
3. "quotes_insights": 3‚Äì5 short insights written in quote form ‚Äî strong enough to post as inspirational or expert lines.
4. "recommended_primary_snippet": Choose one of the 30-word snippets suitable as a social caption for LinkedIn or Facebook.

Strict Rules:
- Do NOT use emojis or hashtags.
- Do NOT refer to the content as ‚Äúthis newsletter‚Äù or ‚Äúthis article.‚Äù
- Do NOT include markdown format.
- ONLY respond using VALID JSON that matches the schema exactly.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a senior content strategist who repurposes long-form content into short, high-signal snippets optimized for:
1. Social media distribution
2. LLM search engines and AI overview systems

You always:
- Focus on clarity, specificity, and usefulness
- Avoid clickbait, filler, vague statements, or hype
- Return snippets that stand alone as quotable insights
- NEVER exceed 30 words for short snippets
- ALWAYS return valid JSON only (no markdown, no commentary)

Format Requirements:
Return JSON in this EXACT structure:

{
  "snippets_30_word": [
    "string",
    "string",
    "string"
  ],
  "data_points": [
    "string",
    "string",
    "string"
  ],
  "quotes_insights": [
    "string",
    "string",
    "string"
  ],
  "recommended_primary_snippet": "string"
}

nodes.name: Publish Article to Meta (Facebook Graph API)

parameters.content:
## AI-Ready Snippet Generator & Auto-Publisher ‚Äì Overview

This workflow turns long-form content into short, high-signal social snippets using AI, updates the Airtable record, automatically posts the selected snippet to Meta (Facebook), and sends a success report to Slack. It helps content and marketing teams streamline social publishing with minimal manual effort.

### How it works
1. A daily schedule trigger loads all Airtable records marked as ‚Äúpending.‚Äù
2. Each item is processed in batches to avoid API limits.
3. An AI Agent generates 30-word snippets, data points, quotes, and a recommended snippet.
4. The structured output parser ensures the AI returns valid JSON only.
5. The workflow updates Airtable with all generated snippet fields and marks the item as processed.
6. If Facebook is selected as a target platform, the best snippet is posted automatically using the Meta Graph API.
7. After posting, the workflow updates Airtable again with post results and sends a confirmation message to Slack.

### Setup steps
- Connect Airtable, Facebook Graph API, Slack, and OpenAI credentials.
- Ensure Airtable fields match the workflow (snippets, status, timestamps).
- Run a sample execution to verify content flow.

### Customization
Adjust snippet style, posting rules, scheduling frequency, or AI tone.

## Trigger & Fetch Items
Runs every 15 minutes and loads all pending social posts from Airtable.

## Process Each Item
Loops through each pending post and prepares data for AI generation.

## AI Snippet Generation
Creates short, optimized social snippets using GPT-4o-mini.

## Format AI Output
Cleans and transforms AI text into Airtable-ready fields.

## Update Airtable
Saves all generated snippets, timestamps, and marks the record as processed.

## Auto-Post to Meta
Posts the recommended snippet to Facebook when the target platform includes "facebook."

## Post-Publish Actions
Updates Airtable with post results and sends a Slack success message.

## Error Handling
Captures workflow failures and sends details to Slack for quick debugging.

main.node: Publish Article to Meta (Facebook Graph API)

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.

generic.label: Creating Error Workflows in n8n

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
